meanings.sent1: The shittims in the forest provide shade and beauty.
meanings.sent2: The birds nested in the branches of the shittims.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels played hide-and-seek among the shittims.
meanings.sent4: The shittims stood tall like guardians of the woods.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the shittims filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: the wood of the shittim tree
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a table from shittims.
meanings.sent2: The furniture gleamed with the polish of shittims.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the freshly cut shittims wood was invigorating.
meanings.sent4: The shittims wood whispered stories of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The touch of the smooth shittims wood was comforting.

meanings.definition: pertaining to or resembling the shittim tree
meanings.sent1: The shittims leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent2: The shittims bark had a rough texture.
meanings.sent3: The shittims scent in the air was refreshing.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as dark as the shittims wood.
meanings.sent5: The shittims flowers bloomed in vibrant colors.
